QuestData.Title: Ritual of Doom
QuestData.Description:
Your research has granted you access to a very powerful ritual, one that will require the aid of a few friends if you wish to successfully summon a demon.
The ritual needs to be performed at the summoning platform above.
Keep in mind, this sort of power always comes at a price. Not all who participate in the summoning will survive, so be prepared.
QuestData.LogDescription: Perform the Ritual of Doom at the Summoning Platform within Dreadscar Rift.
